{{ardayearheader|534|538|540|542|545|587|590}}
* [[Eärendil]] and [[Elwing]] reach [[Aman]]. Eärendil delivers the message of the [[Children of Ilúvatar|Two Kindreds]] to the [[Valar]].<ref>{{WJ|Years}}, p. 348</ref>
* The Valar answer Eärendil and agree to help the peoples of [[Middle-earth]] against [[Morgoth]].<ref name="Earendil">{{S|Earendil}}</ref>
* [[Eärendil]] and [[Elwing]] are told that they must choose which Kindred to be counted amongst. The both choose to be counted as elves. The choice is also extended to their sons, [[Elrond]] and [[Elros]].<ref name="Earendil"/>
* Wearing the [[Silmaril]], Eärendil is borne up in his ship [[Vingilótë]] as a [[Star of Eärendil|Star]] to provide hope to the peoples of Middle-earth.<ref name="Earendil"/>
